prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Synth Pad, Drums, Piano, Guitar, but without Pipe.
captions:
Style 1:
This song features Bass, Synth Pad, Drums, Piano, and Guitar, but no Pipe.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Bass, Synth Pad, Drums, Piano, and Guitar, yet Pipe is absent.

Style 3:
This piece has Bass, Synth Pad, Drums, Piano, and Guitar, Pipe excluded.
